Binarize continuous raster values

Reclassify continuous raster values into binary map cells based upon given break(s).

util_binarize(x, breaks)

Arguments

x

[Raster* object]
breaks

a vector with one or more break percentages

Value

RasterBrick

Details

Breaks are considerred to be habitat percentages (p). If more than one percentage is given multiple layers are written in the same brick.

Examples

rndMap <- nlm_random(10, 10)
breaks <- c(0.3, 0.5, 0.7, 0.9)
rnd_bin <- util_binarize(rndMap, breaks)
util_plot(rnd_bin)

Contents

  • Value
